parse.title: List of archives in the United Kingdom

text.*:
This list is incomplete; you can help by expanding it.

This is a list of archives in the United Kingdom. As of 2009[update] there were 122 national, 654 local, 328 university, 1,224 special and 61 business archives.[1]

Contents

  • 1 Archives in England
  • 2 Archives in Northern Ireland
  • 3 Archives in Scotland
  • 4 Archives in Wales
  • 5 See also
  • 6 References
  • 7 External links

References[edit]

  1. ^ "Libraries, Archives, Museums and Publishing Online Statistics Tables". LISU. Loughborough University. 2009. Archived from the original on 2013-08-07. 
  2. ^ "Endangered Languages Archive (ELAR)". 
  3. ^ "Dundee City Archives". Dundee City Council. Retrieved 27 January 2012. 
  4. ^ "Archive Services". University of Dundee. Retrieved 27 January 2012. 
  5. ^ "Gwent records office to open next month", South Wales Argus, 29 September 2011. Retrieved 16 February 2016.
